Megatron Revived:
 
Megatron headed toward Rodimus' office, having detected a new energy signature in the base.  He stopped outside the door, and listened for a bit, then hit the door buzzer.  He might be able to contribute to the planing going on inside.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
SIlence::

She smiled back at him.  It was nice to see another bot that didn't
mind a mistake being made.  Somewhere in the back of her memory banks,
she feared a dark thought stirring.  
She disreguarded it and just kept smiling. "Perhaps a truce could be
negotiated? After all, no bot can go on forever and a day in a state
of constant battle.  A bot must recharge.  If it does not, it suffers
from system failure. Is there a way we can simply, erhm, pull the
plug.......so to speak?"


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

__________________________________________________
